Title: It is now the spring plowing season […]
Designer: Central Academy of Fine Arts "Liaoyuan Battle Corps" (中央美术学院《燎原战斗团》供倘)
Publisher: Hebei renmin meishu chubanshe (河北人民美术出版社)
Notes: Peasants and Red Guards working together in the countryside. The title is a Mao quotation from 1945 that reads in full "It is now the spring plowing season. I hope that every leading comrade in the liberated areas, every worker, all the masses, will not lose the opportunity to grasp the links in the production chain, to attain greater results than last year".
